page.title: 04A DAY AT BLAYDON SCHOOL
page.content: On Mondays I get up at 7.30am and have my breakfast. Then I put on my uniform and go for the school bus. I arrive just before 8.50am when the bell goes. We go to our registration classes until 9.15am. My first lesson is Chemistry. All lessons last 70 mins.The morning break lasts 15mins and then it is Woodwork. We are making wooden animals. Dinner is from 11.50am to 1.00pm. We have to go home because of the teacher's action over their pay claim. Our next lesson is Physical Education during which we do athletics. Afternoon break is from 2.10pm to 2.20pm, and then we get History. In this lesson we are writing our contributions for the Domesday Project. School ends at 3.30pm. I go home on the school bus which leaves from the school gates.
